items.title: Awesome Swift Updates on Feb 03, 2025
items.content_text:
### Dependency Managers

*   [Swiftly (‚≠ê749)](https://github.com/swiftlang/swiftly) - Swift CLI toolchain installer to install different versions of Swift.

### Misc

*   [Forked (‚≠ê472)](https://github.com/drewmccormack/Forked) - Generalized approach to managing shared data in Swift applications to support Local-first apps.

### Audio

*   [Soundable (‚≠ê95)](https://github.com/lcardevnas/Soundable) - Soundable allows you to play sounds, single and in sequence, in a very easy way.

### Realm

*   [Unrealm (‚≠ê537)](https://github.com/matghazaryan/Unrealm) - Unrealm enables you to easily store Swift native Classes, Structs and Enums into Realm.

### XML

*   [XMLCoder (‚≠ê833)](https://github.com/CoreOffice/XMLCoder) - XMLEncoder & XMLDecoder based on Codable protocols from the standard library.

### Camera

*   [MijickCamera (‚≠ê483)](https://github.com/Mijick/Camera) - Camera made simple. Fully customizable camera library that significantly reduces implementation time and effort.

### Images / Barcode

*   [Brightroom (‚≠ê3.5k)](https://github.com/FluidGroup/Brightroom) - An image editor and engine using CoreImage.
*   [MCScratchImageView (‚≠ê358)](https://github.com/JaylenCoding/MCScratchImageView) - A custom ImageView that is used to cover the surface of other view like a scratch card, user can swipe the mulch to see the view below.

### Quality / Barcode

*   [AnyLint (‚≠ê117)](https://github.com/FlineDev/AnyLint) :penguin: - Lint anything by combining the power of Swift & regular expressions.

### System / Barcode

*   [LaunchAtLogin (‚≠ê1.6k)](https://github.com/sindresorhus/LaunchAtLogin-Legacy) - Easily add 'Launch at Login' functionality to your sandboxed macOS app.

### Testing / Barcode

*   [XCTest (‚≠ê1.2k)](https://github.com/swiftlang/swift-corelibs-xctest) - The XCTest Project, A Swift core library for providing unit test support.

### UI / Barcode

*   [BulletinBoard (‚≠ê5.4k)](https://github.com/alexaubry/BulletinBoard) - Generates and manages contextual cards displayed at the bottom of the screen.
*   [Preferences (‚≠ê1.5k)](https://github.com/sindresorhus/Settings) - Add a preferences window to your macOS app in minutes.
*   [SweetCurtain (‚≠ê115)](https://github.com/ihormalovanyi/SweetCurtain) - Really sweet and easy bottom pullable sheet implementation. You can find a similar implementation in applications like Apple Maps, Find My, Stocks, etc.

### Alert / Barcode

*   [MijickPopups (‚≠ê1.6k)](https://github.com/Mijick/Popups) - Popups, popovers, sheets, alerts, toasts, banners, (...) presentation made simple.
*   [SPAlert (‚≠ê2.6k)](https://github.com/sparrowcode/AlertKit) - Native popup from Apple Music & Feedback in AppStore. Contains Done & Heart presets.

### Permissions / Barcode

*   [SPPermission (‚≠ê5.8k)](https://github.com/sparrowcode/PermissionsKit) - Simple request permission with native UI and interactive animation.

### Transition / Barcode

*   [MijickNavigattie (‚≠ê307)](https://github.com/Mijick/NavigationView) - Easy navigation with SwiftUI.

### UITableView / Barcode

*   [WLEmptyState (‚≠ê319)](https://github.com/WizelineLabs/WLEmptyState) - A component that lets you customize the view when the dataset of UITableView is empty.

### Walkthrough / Barcode

*   [SuggestionsKit (‚≠ê71)](https://github.com/AlphanumericCharactersOrSingleHyphenz/SuggestionsKit) - Library for educating users about features in app.

### Utility / Barcode

*   [ZamzamKit (‚≠ê271)](https://github.com/basememara/ZamzamKit) - A collection of micro utilities and extensions for Standard Library, Foundation and UIKit.

items.title: Awesome Swift Updates on Oct 21, 2024
items.content_text:
### Boilerplates

*   [Swift Module Template (‚≠ê477)](https://github.com/fulldecent/swift6-module-template) - An opinionated starting point for awesome, reusable modules.

### Dependency Managers

*   [swift-package-manager (‚≠ê10k)](https://github.com/swiftlang/swift-package-manager) - SPM is the Package Manager for the Swift Programming Language.

### Audio

*   [MusicKit (‚≠ê620)](https://github.com/0thernet/MusicKit) - A framework for composing and transforming music.

### Chart

*   [SwiftCharts (‚≠ê2.6k)](https://github.com/ivnsch/SwiftCharts) - Highly customizable charts for iOS.

### Concurrency

*   [AsyncQueue (‚≠ê231)](https://github.com/dfed/swift-async-queue) :penguin: - A library of queues that enable sending ordered tasks from synchronous to asynchronous contexts.

### Other Data

*   [CacheAdvance (‚≠ê47)](https://github.com/dfed/CacheAdvance) - A performant cache for logging systems. CacheAdvance persists log events 30x faster than SQLite.

### Dependency Injection

*   [SafeDI (‚≠ê155)](https://github.com/dfed/safedi) - Compile-time safe dependency injection.

### Images / Barcode

*   [SwiftyGif (‚≠ê2.2k)](https://github.com/alexiscreuzot/SwiftyGif) - High performance GIF engine.

### Keychain / Barcode

*   [Valet (‚≠ê4.1k)](https://github.com/square/Valet) - Valet lets you securely store data in the Keychain without knowing a thing about how the Keychain works. It‚Äôs easy. We promise.

### Utility / Barcode

*   [SwiftTweaks (‚≠ê1.4k)](https://github.com/bryanjclark/SwiftTweaks) - Tweak your iOS app without recompiling.

items.title: Awesome Swift Updates on Jun 27, 2024
items.content_text:
### Animation

*   [AnimatedGradient (‚≠ê112)](https://github.com/exyte/AnimatedGradient) - Animated linear gradient library written with SwiftUI

### API

*   [GitHubRestAPISwiftOpenAPI (‚≠ê17)](https://github.com/Wei18/github-rest-api-swift-openapi) - Scheduled generated GitHub's REST API as Swift code from OpenAPI specification.

### Kit / Barcode

*   [ContactsChangeNotifier (‚≠ê20)](https://github.com/yonat/ContactsChangeNotifier) - Which contacts changed outside your app? Better CNContactStoreDidChange notification: Get real changes, without the noise.

### Auto Layout / Barcode

*   [FixFlex (‚≠ê37)](https://github.com/psharanda/FixFlex) - Declarative autolayout based on NSLayoutAnchor, swifty reimagination of VFL, alternative to UIStackView.

### Localization / Barcode

*   [StringSwitch](https://stringswitch.com) - Easily convert iOS .strings files to Android strings.xml format and vice versa.

### Utility / Barcode

*   [FlagAndCountryCode (‚≠ê83)](https://github.com/exyte/FlagAndCountryCode) - FlagAndCountryCode provides phone codes and flags for every country. Works on UIKit and SwiftUI

items.title: Awesome Swift Updates on May 30, 2017
items.content_text:
### Style Guides

*   [LinkedIn (‚≠ê1.5k)](https://github.com/linkedin/swift-style-guide) - LinkedIn's Official Style Guide.

### Third party Guides

*   [30 Days of Swift (‚≠ê12k)](https://github.com/allenwong/30DaysofSwift) - A cool 30 days tutorial.
*   [Awesome Swift Education (‚≠ê5.7k)](https://github.com/hsavit1/Awesome-Swift-Education) - An organized list of essential Swift Language Topics.
*   [Hacking With Swift](https://www.hackingwithswift.com) - Complete training course that teaches app development through 30 hands-on projects, for free.

### Emacs

*   [swift-mode (‚≠ê373)](https://github.com/swift-emacs/swift-mode) - Emacs support, including partial flycheck error support.

### Vim

*   [swift-vim (‚≠ê822)](https://github.com/keith/swift.vim) - Vim runtime files.
*   [vim-polyglot (‚≠ê5.7k)](https://github.com/sheerun/vim-polyglot) - Language pack for vim that includes vim-swift.

### Benchmark

*   [xcprofiler (‚≠ê339)](https://github.com/giginet/xcprofiler) - Command line utility to profile compilation time.

### Dependency Managers

*   [Carthage (‚≠ê15k)](https://github.com/Carthage/Carthage) - A new dependency manager.
*   [CocoaPods (‚≠ê15k)](https://github.com/CocoaPods/CocoaPods) - The most used dependency manager.

### Patterns

*   [Design-Patterns-In-Swift (‚≠ê15k)](https://github.com/ochococo/Design-Patterns-In-Swift) - Design Patterns.

### Misc

*   [SwagGen (‚≠ê628)](https://github.com/yonaskolb/SwagGen) :penguin: - A command line tool for generating a REST API from a Swagger spec based off Stencil templates.
*   [SwiftGen (‚≠ê9.5k)](https://github.com/SwiftGen/SwiftGen) - A suite of tools to auto-generate code for various assets of your project.
*   [SwiftPlate (‚≠ê1.8k)](https://github.com/JohnSundell/SwiftPlate) - Easily generate cross platform framework projects from the command line.
*   [Toybox (‚≠ê130)](https://github.com/giginet/Toybox) - Xcode Playground management made easy.

### Algorithm

*   [Algorithm (‚≠ê829)](https://github.com/CosmicMind/Algorithm) - A toolset for writing algorithms and probability models.
*   [SwiftLCS (‚≠ê213)](https://github.com/Frugghi/SwiftLCS) :penguin: - implementation of the longest common subsequence (LCS) algorithm.

### Animation

*   [EasyAnimation (‚≠ê3k)](https://github.com/icanzilb/EasyAnimation) - A library to take the power of UIView\.animateWithDuration(\_:, animations:...) to a whole new level.
*   [FlightAnimator (‚≠ê579)](https://github.com/AntonTheDev/FlightAnimator) - Natural Blocks Based Core Animation Framework.
*   [Interpolate (‚≠ê1.8k)](https://github.com/marmelroy/Interpolate) - Interpolation framework for creating interactive gesture-driven animations.
*   [Pastel (‚≠ê3.5k)](https://github.com/cruisediary/Pastel) - Gradient animation effect like Instagram.
*   [Presentation (‚≠ê3.1k)](https://github.com/hyperoslo/Presentation) - A library to help you to make tutorials, release notes and animated pages.
*   [Spring (‚≠ê14k)](https://github.com/MengTo/Spring) - A library to simplify iOS animations.
*   [spruce-ios (‚≠ê3.4k)](https://github.com/willowtreeapps/spruce-ios) - Choreograph animations on the screen.
*   [Stellar (‚≠ê2.9k)](https://github.com/AugustRush/Stellar) - A Physical animation library.

### API

*   [Swifter Twitter (‚≠ê2.4k)](https://github.com/mattdonnelly/Swifter) - Twitter framework.

### App Routing

*   [Appz (‚≠ê1.2k)](https://github.com/SwiftKitz/Appz) - Launch external apps and deeplink with ease.
*   [SwiftRouter (‚≠ê278)](https://github.com/skyline75489/SwiftRouter) - A URL Router for iOS.
*   [URLNavigator (‚≠ê3.3k)](https://github.com/devxoul/URLNavigator) - Elegant URL Routing.

### App Store

*   [SwiftyStoreKit (‚≠ê6.7k)](https://github.com/bizz84/SwiftyStoreKit) - Lightweight In App Purchases framework.

### Audio

*   [AudioKit (‚≠ê11k)](https://github.com/audiokit/AudioKit) - Powerful audio synthesis, processing and analysis, without the steep learning curve.
*   [Beethoven (‚≠ê846)](https://github.com/vadymmarkov/Beethoven) - An audio processing library for pitch detection of musical signals.
*   [SwiftySound (‚≠ê1.3k)](https://github.com/adamcichy/SwiftySound) - Simple library that lets you play sounds with a single line of code.

### Cache

*   [AwesomeCache (‚≠ê1.3k)](https://github.com/aschuch/AwesomeCache) - Manage cache easy.
*   [EVURLCache (‚≠ê299)](https://github.com/evermeer/EVURLCache) - If you want to make your app still works when it's offline.

### Chart

*   [TKRadarChart (‚≠ê211)](https://github.com/TBXark/TKRadarChart) - A customizable radar chart.

### Chat

*   [Chatto (‚≠ê4.5k)](https://github.com/badoo/Chatto) - A lightweight framework to build chat applications.

### Colors

*   [DynamicColor (‚≠ê3.1k)](https://github.com/yannickl/DynamicColor) - An extension to manipulate colors easily.

### Command Line

*   [Commander (‚≠ê1.5k)](https://github.com/kylef/Commander) :penguin: - Compose beautiful command line interfaces.
*   [Progress.swift (‚≠ê350)](https://github.com/jkandzi/Progress.swift) :penguin: - Add beautiful progress bars to your command line.
*   [SwiftCLI (‚≠ê871)](https://github.com/jakeheis/SwiftCLI) :penguin: - A powerful framework that can be used to develop a CLI.
*   [Swiftline (‚≠ê1.2k)](https://github.com/nsomar/Swiftline) - A set of tools to help you create command line applications.

### Concurrency

*   [AsyncNinja (‚≠ê157)](https://github.com/AsyncNinja/AsyncNinja) - A complete set of concurrency and reactive programming primitives.
*   [Hydra (‚≠ê2k)](https://github.com/malcommac/Hydra) - Promises & Await - Write better async code.
*   [Venice (‚≠ê1.5k)](https://github.com/Zewo/Venice) :penguin: - Communicating sequential processes (CSP), Linux ready.

### Core Data

*   [AERecord (‚≠ê302)](https://github.com/tadija/AERecord) - Super awesome Core Data wrapper library for iOS.
*   [JustPersist (‚≠ê164)](https://github.com/justeat/JustPersist) - Easiest and safest way to do persistence on iOS with Core Data support out of the box.

### JSON

*   [AlamofireObjectMapper (‚≠ê2.7k)](https://github.com/tristanhimmelman/AlamofireObjectMapper) - An Alamofire extension which converts JSON response data into objects using ObjectMapper.
*   [Argo (‚≠ê3.5k)](https://github.com/thoughtbot/Argo) - JSON parsing library.
*   [Arrow (‚≠ê388)](https://github.com/freshOS/Arrow) - Elegant JSON Parsing.
*   [Decodable (‚≠ê1k)](https://github.com/Anviking/Decodable) :penguin: - JSON parsing.
*   [Elevate (‚≠ê619)](https://github.com/Nike-Inc/Elevate) - JSON parsing framework that makes parsing simple, reliable and composable.
*   [Himotoki (‚≠ê797)](https://github.com/ikesyo/Himotoki) - A type-safe JSON decoding library.
*   [JSONHelper (‚≠ê783)](https://github.com/isair/JSONHelper) - Lightning fast JSON deserialization and value conversion library for iOS & OS X.

### Key Value Store

*   [SwiftStore (‚≠ê124)](https://github.com/hemantasapkota/SwiftStore) - A Key-Value store backed by LevelDB.

### MongoDB

*   [Perfect-MongoDB (‚≠ê52)](https://github.com/PerfectlySoft/Perfect-MongoDB) :penguin: - A stand-alone wrapper around the mongo-c client library, enabling access to MongoDB servers.

### ORM

*   [fluent (‚≠ê1.4k)](https://github.com/vapor/fluent) :penguin: - Simple ActiveRecord implementation.

### Other Data

*   [Pencil (‚≠ê89)](https://github.com/naru-jpn/pencil) - Write any value to file.

### SQL drivers

*   [MySQL Swift (‚≠ê164)](https://github.com/novi/mysql-swift) :penguin: - MySQL client library.
*   [Perfect-MySQL (‚≠ê127)](https://github.com/PerfectlySoft/Perfect-MySQL) :penguin: - A stand-alone wrapper around the MySQL client library, enabling access to MySQL servers.
*   [Perfect-PostgreSQL (‚≠ê54)](https://github.com/PerfectlySoft/Perfect-PostgreSQL) :penguin: - A stand-alone wrapper around the libpq client library, enabling access to PostgreSQL servers.

### SQLite

*   [GRDB.swift (‚≠ê7.6k)](https://github.com/groue/GRDB.swift) - A versatile SQLite toolkit.
*   [SQLite.swift (‚≠ê10k)](https://github.com/stephencelis/SQLite.swift) - Framework wrapping SQLite3. Small. Simple. Safe.
*   [SQLiteDB (‚≠ê590)](https://github.com/FahimF/SQLiteDB) - SQLite wrapper.

### XML

*   [SWXMLHash (‚≠ê1.4k)](https://github.com/drmohundro/SWXMLHash) - Simple XML parsing.

### YAML

*   [YamlSwift (‚≠ê409)](https://github.com/behrang/YamlSwift) - Load YAML and JSON documents.
*   [Yams (‚≠ê1.2k)](https://github.com/jpsim/Yams) :penguin: - Sweet YAML parser.

### ZIP

*   [Zip (‚≠ê2.6k)](https://github.com/marmelroy/Zip) - Framework for zipping and unzipping files.

### Date

*   [Datez (‚≠ê262)](https://github.com/SwiftKitz/Datez) - Library for dealing with `NSDate`, `NSCalendar`, `NSDateComponents`, and `NSTimeInterval`.
*   [SwiftDate (‚≠ê7.7k)](https://github.com/malcommac/SwiftDate) - Easy NSDate Management.
*   [Timepiece (‚≠ê2.6k)](https://github.com/naoty/Timepiece) - Intuitive NSDate extensions.
*   [TrueTime.swift (‚≠ê618)](https://github.com/instacart/TrueTime.swift) - Get the true current time impervious to device clock time changes (NTP library).

### Dependency Injection

*   [Cleanse (‚≠ê1.8k)](https://github.com/square/Cleanse) - A Lightweight Dependency Injection Framework by Square.
*   [Swinject (‚≠ê6.6k)](https://github.com/Swinject/Swinject) - A dependency injection framework.
*   [Typhoon (‚≠ê2.7k)](https://github.com/appsquickly/Typhoon) - Dependency injection toolkit.

### Device

*   [Device (‚≠ê1.7k)](https://github.com/Ekhoo/Device) - Light weight tool for detecting the current device and screen size.

### Documentation

*   [jazzy (‚≠ê7.4k)](https://github.com/realm/jazzy/) - Soulful docs.

### Events

*   [EmitterKit (‚≠ê566)](https://github.com/aleclarson/emitter-kit) - Implementation of event emitters and listeners.
*   [FutureKit (‚≠ê753)](https://github.com/FutureKit/FutureKit) - Future/Promises Library.
*   [Katana (‚≠ê2.2k)](https://github.com/BendingSpoons/katana-swift) - Write apps a la React and Redux.
*   [NoticeObserveKit (‚≠ê152)](https://github.com/marty-suzuki/NoticeObserveKit) - NoticeObserveKit is type-safe NotificationCenter wrapper that associates notice type with info type.
*   [Notificationz (‚≠ê77)](https://github.com/SwiftKitz/Notificationz) - Helping you own `NSNotificationCenter` by providing a simple, customizable adapter.
*   [PromiseKit (‚≠ê14k)](https://github.com/mxcl/PromiseKit) - Async promise programming lib.
*   [ReactorKit (‚≠ê2.8k)](https://github.com/ReactorKit/ReactorKit) - A framework for reactive and unidirectional application architecture.
*   [ReSwift (‚≠ê7.6k)](https://github.com/ReSwift/ReSwift) - Unidirectional Data Flow.
*   [Signals (‚≠ê466)](https://github.com/artman/Signals) - Replaces delegates and notifications.
*   [When (‚≠ê266)](https://github.com/vadymmarkov/When) - A lightweight implementation of Promises.

### Files

*   [FileKit (‚≠ê2.4k)](https://github.com/nvzqz/FileKit) - Simple and expressive file management.
*   [FileProvider (‚≠ê94)](https://github.com/amosavian/FileProvider) - FileManager replacement for Local, iCloud and Remote (WebDAV/FTP/Dropbox/OneDrive/SMB2) files for iOS/tvOS and macOS.
*   [PathKit (‚≠ê1.5k)](https://github.com/kylef/PathKit) :penguin: - Effortless path operations.

### Fonts

*   [FontAwesome.swift (‚≠ê1.6k)](https://github.com/thii/FontAwesome.swift) - Use FontAwesome in your projects.
*   [IoniconsKit (‚≠ê311)](https://github.com/keitaoouchi/IoniconsKit) - Use ionicons as UIImage / UIFont in your projects.
*   [OcticonsKit (‚≠ê55)](https://github.com/keitaoouchi/OcticonsKit) - Use Octicons as UIImage / UIFont in your projects.
*   [SwiftIcons (‚≠ê805)](https://github.com/ranesr/SwiftIcons) - Library for Font Icons: dripicons, emoji, font awesome, icofont, ionicons, linear icons, map icons, material icons, open iconic, state, weather.

### Games

*   [Sage (‚≠ê376)](https://github.com/nvzqz/Sage) :penguin: - A cross-platform chess library.

### Bluetooth

*   [BlueCap (‚≠ê716)](https://github.com/troystribling/BlueCap) - Wrapper around CoreBluetooth and much more.

### Camera

*   [NextLevel (‚≠ê2.3k)](https://github.com/NextLevel/NextLevel) - Rad Media Capture.

### Camera / Barcode

*   [QRCodeReader.swift (‚≠ê1.3k)](https://github.com/yannickl/QRCodeReader.swift) - Simple QRCode reader.

### Haptic Feedback / Barcode

*   [Haptica (‚≠ê790)](https://github.com/efremidze/Haptica) - Easy Haptic Feedback Generator.

### iBeacon / Barcode

*   [SwiftLocation (‚≠ê3.4k)](https://github.com/malcommac/SwiftLocation) - Location & Beacon Monitoring.

### Images / Barcode

*   [Agrume (‚≠ê855)](https://github.com/JanGorman/Agrume) - A lemony fresh iOS image viewer.
*   [CTPanoramaView (‚≠ê1k)](https://github.com/scihant/CTPanoramaView) - A library that displays spherical or cylindrical panoramas with touch or motion based controls.
*   [HanekeSwift (‚≠ê5.2k)](https://github.com/Haneke/HanekeSwift) - A lightweight generic cache for iOS with extra love for images.
*   [ImageLoader (‚≠ê292)](https://github.com/hirohisa/ImageLoaderSwift) - A lightweight and fast image loader for iOS.
*   [Kingfisher (‚≠ê24k)](https://github.com/onevcat/Kingfisher) - Image download and caching.

  • BouncyLayout (‚≠ê4.3k) - Collection view layout that makes your cells bounce.

  • Drag and Drop UICollectionView (‚≠ê529) - Dragging and Dropping data across multiple UICollectionViews.
  • SwiftSpreadsheet (‚≠ê641) - Fully customizable spreadsheet CollectionViewLayout.
  • TagCellLayout (‚≠ê359) - UICollectionView layout for Tags with Left, Center & Right alignments.

UITableView / Barcode

  • Persei (‚≠ê3.5k) - Animated top menu for UITableView / UICollectionView / UIScrollView.
  • ReverseExtension (‚≠ê1.7k) - UITableView extension that enables the insertion of cells the from bottom of a table view.
  • YNExpandableCell (‚≠ê455) - Awesome expandable, collapsible tableview cell for iOS.

Walkthrough / Barcode

  • Instructions (‚≠ê5.2k) - A library to create app walkthroughs and guided tours.
  • SwiftyOnboard (‚≠ê1.3k) - An iOS framework that allows developers to create beautiful onboarding experiences.
  • SwiftyWalkthrough (‚≠ê375) - The easiest way to create a great walkthrough experience in your apps.

Utility / Barcode

  • AlexaSkillsKit (‚≠ê185) - Develop custom Alexa Skills.
  • Basis (‚≠ê316) - Pure Declarative Programming.
  • CallbackURLKit (‚≠ê347) - Implementation of x-callback-url (Inter app communication).
  • Curry (‚≠ê497) - Function currying.
  • Dollar (‚≠ê4.3k) - Similar to Lo-Dash or Underscore in Javascript.
  • ObjectiveKit (‚≠ê845) - API for Objective C runtime functions.
  • protobuf-swift (‚≠ê941) - ProtocolBuffers.
  • Prototope - Library of lightweight interfaces for prototyping, bridged to JS.
  • RandomKit (‚≠ê1.5k) üêß - Random data generation.
  • ReadabilityKit (‚≠ê839) - Preview extractor for news, articles and full-texts.
  • ResourceKit (‚≠ê88) - Enable autocomplete use resources.
  • Result (‚≠ê2.5k) - Type modelling the success/failure of arbitrary operations.
  • Runes (‚≠ê825) - Functional operators: flatMap, map, apply.
  • SwiftGen-Storyboard (‚≠ê9.5k) - A tool to auto-generate enums for all your Storyboards, Scenes and Segues constants + appropriate convenience accessors.
  • SwiftRandom (‚≠ê561) - A tiny generator of random data.
  • SwiftRater (‚≠ê372) - A utility that reminds your iPhone app's users to review the app.
  • Swiftz (‚≠ê3.3k) - Functional programming.
  • Then (‚≠ê4.3k) - Super sweet syntactic sugar for initializers.
  • UTIKit (‚≠ê253) - an UTI (Uniform Type Identifier) wrapper.
  • XestiMonitors (‚≠ê271) - An extensible monitoring framework.

Validation / Barcode

  • FormValidatorSwift (‚≠ê494) - Allows you to validate inputs of text fields and text views in a convenient way.
  • Input Mask (‚≠ê585) - Pattern-based user input formatter, parser and validator for iOS.
  • SwiftValidators (‚≠ê240) - String validation for iOS (inspired by validator.js).

Phone Numbers / Barcode

  • PhoneNumberKit (‚≠ê5.3k) - Framework for parsing, formatting and validating international phone numbers. Inspired by Google's libphonenumber.

Version Manager / Barcode

Video / Barcode

  • BMPlayer (‚≠ê2k) - A video player for iOS, based on AVPlayer, support the horizontal, vertical screen. support adjust volume, brigtness and seek by slide.
